tool_description: Word Finder is the perfect help when your vocabulary fails you. It's a unique word search tool that finds all possible words made up of the letters you input.

api_list.name: Unscramble Words Solver
api_list.description: Solve your unscrambled words with our unscramble API.

required_parameters.name: dictionary
required_parameters.description: The dictionary to use for unscrambling words.

required_parameters.name: group_by_length
required_parameters.description: Whether to group the results by word length.

required_parameters.name: page_size
required_parameters.description: The number of results to return per page.

required_parameters.name: word_sorting
required_parameters.description: The criteria for sorting the words.

required_parameters.name: letters
required_parameters.description: The letters to unscramble into words.
